Title: All Hands on Decker
Writer: Neil Gaiman (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Sam Kieth (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Mike Dringenberg (based on characters created by: for Vertigo), Tom Kapinos (developed by), Sheri Elwood, Chris Rafferty (executive story editor), Mike Costa (executive story editor), Julia Fontana (story editor)
Actors: Tom Ellis, Lauren German, Kevin Alejandro, Tricia Helfer
Plot: When Chloe takes some time off, Lucifer is forced to work with Dan on a murder case involving a dog show. Meanwhile, Charlotte and Maze have differing ideas for Chloe's party and after a wild night, Chloe rethinks a life-changing decision.
